name: A Spaceship in a Green Land
name_original: A Spaceship in a Green Land
description:
Here it comes the spaceship!

A Spaceship in a Green Land is a game based in simple shooters and it have the GameBoy Colour Pallete on it.

You Have to shoot on 100 meteorites to win (Thats a challenge!)

Try to don't crash on the meteorites or... Game Over!

Some characteristics of the game:

-This game is for the GB Jam 6.

-It uses Pixelated Music.

-It uses the Colour Pallete of Game Boy.

Programs and Websites Used:

-GameMaker:Studio

-Beepbox.co

-Wikipedia.org

Download and Donate if you want for more updates!

(Donation isn't working)
